Key Match Events: Detroit guard Jaden Ivey sustained a severe injury to his lower left leg in the fourth quarter.
Orlando's Cole Anthony slipped and fell, causing the injury to Ivey.
Ivey led the Pistons with 22 points.
Detroit won the game with a score of 105-96.
Post-Match Reflections: Pistons coach J.B. Bickerstaff commented on the team's effort and their concern for Ivey, stating 'There’s no better person or teammate than J.I. and no one cares more about this than he does. I give the guys credit for getting it done – they care about him and they didn’t want to let him down.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Players from both teams consoled both Ivey and Anthony after the incident.
